amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the number of years for which the Committee is authorized in the bill from five to three. It also would reduce to $250,000,000 the amount authorized in each of the three years, from 2011 to 2013.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-304 to change the number of years for which the Committee is authorized in the bill from five to three. It also would reduce to $250,000,000 the amount authorized in each of the three years, from 2011 to 2013.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 256 (Roll no. 801).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 256 (Roll no. 801).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
